Translate.welcome: Welcome to the custom covers service
Translate.new_search_msg: To start a new cover upload, please enter record MMS ID:
Translate.CZ_unsupported: Cover upload is (currently) not supported for CZ records
Translate.no_covers: There are no covers available for this record (yet)

confirm_del.title: Confirm cover deletion
confirm_del.msg: Are you sure you want to delete this cover?

confirm_repl.title: Confirm cover upload
confirm_repl.msg: There is already a custom cover registered for this record. Are you sure you want to replace this cover?
